text:
poll/unix/port.c suffers from the same bug as kqueue (http://www.mail-
archive.com/dev@apr.apache.org/msg17085.html). The fix is the same:

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/apr/apr/trunk/poll/unix/kqueue.c?
r1=428317&r2=439667
creator: alex.kiernan@gmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text: Nice low hanging fruit - solved, thanks for the report.
